channel.title: How do i change level require ments?
channel.description:
say i wanted to change the level requirement for karils cross bow and make it 99 range how would i do that or just make level requirements for any weapon?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 29, 2007, 10:36:24 AM[/size][hr]anyone>?
[center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnwarn.gif[/img] Don't "bump", read the rules. - The Un-Named[/center]

item.source: How do i change level require ments?

item.title: How do i change level require ments?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Find yours and either change one of the names, or add one like this:

if (ItemName.startsWith("Crystal")) { return 90; } if (ItemName.startsWith("WeaponNameBEGINNINGofITlikeABYSSAL")) { return (levelFORit); }
It’s return the level required for the item that begins with that name. Need any help, ask.

Read full topic

item.title: How do i change level require ments?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Client.java.

public int GetCLRanged(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == -1) { return 1; } String ItemName = GetItemName(ItemID); if (ItemName.startsWith("Karil")) { return 70; } if (ItemName.startsWith("Crystal")) { return 90; } return 1; }

Read full topic
